data.title: 准备以至少30秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: What I can see from the picture is that there is a little girl crouching over a dandelion. A dandelion is a small wild plant with a soft white ball of seeds that can be easily blown away for propagation. The little girl is holding a dandelion in her hand and blowing its seeds. The girl has curly blonde hair, wears a white hoody. She looks rather cute. She is in the middle of a plant field that is dominated by green. This picture is beautifully taken, presenting us with an impressive view where the little girl and nature are in perfect harmony. （104 字）
